author: ColdFusion
description:
Go to https://brilliant.org/coldfusion for 30-day free trial + 20% off!

In this episode we check out the details on a world first: Banning children under 16 from using social media. On the surface it sounds fine but as you dig deeper, things get murky. 

Sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dCTHXsup8Xb6ZqOiBQKFY-uQ9Go413Bog-IciZb6OZY/edit?usp=sharing
